body: mediascape says that "this weekend promises to be an exciting one for reggae lovers", as reggae icon Buju Banton, who is due to head back to court soon to face drug trafficking charges, will have his Miami concert broadcast via mobile phone, so that "thousands of subscribers will be able to watch...from beginning to end, exclusively through their handsets."
